schema.name: Tomato Basil Penne Pasta
recipeIngredient: 2 cup (4.7 oz) cooked, Cooked Penne Rigate

recipeInstructions.text: Start by chopping 1 cup of red onion and setting aside.
Prepare 0.12 cup(s) of basil leaves by washing and roughly chopping them.
Next, measure out 2 tablespoons of garlic pepper grinder.
Cook 125 grams of fresh ground pork in a pan over medium heat until fully cooked, breaking it apart with a spatula, about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, boil water in a large pot and cook 2 cups (4.7 oz) of Penne Rigate according to the package instructions until al dente, then drain.
In a large skillet, saut√© the chopped red onion with the prepared garlic pepper grinder over medium heat until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add the cooked pork, halved tomatoes, and cooked Penne Rigate to the skillet. Stir well to combine. Let it cook for another 5 minutes to let the flavors meld.
Remove from heat and stir in the chopped basil leaves. Serve warm.

schema.description: This Tomato Basil Penne Pasta is perfect for anyone looking for healthy, flavorful meal options. Tagged as 'Healthyfied', 'Healthy Recipes', and 'Healthified Recipes', it's crafted to support a nutritious diet without sacrificing taste.
